question: Find a week with {city}'s {stats} {col} levels for all these years
code:
def true_code():
    import numpy as np
    import pandas as pd
    main_data = pd.read_csv("raw_data/main_data.csv")
    main_data['Timestamp'] = pd.to_datetime(main_data['Timestamp'])
    data = main_data[main_data["city"] == "{code_city}"]
    data = data.dropna(subset="{code_col}")
    data = data.groupby(data["Timestamp"].dt.isocalendar().week)["PM2.5"].mean().reset_index()
    data = data.sort_values(by="PM2.5")
    print(data.iloc[{code_stats}]["week"])


true_code()
